name: Enchanted Vertical Slabs
description:
A simple, vanilla-like mod that adds Vertical Slabs to Minecraft.
New in v1.7: 
  - Update to 1.19.3 
  - Slabs now show near blocks of the same material in the creative menu 
  - Added 1.20 slabs (enable the update_1_20 data pack)

New in v1.7.1: 
  - Update to 1.19.4 
  - Added cherry slabs
